entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of snow. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:53 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
